title: Bug 36234out of memory error when compiling
description: Bug 36234out of memory error when compiling Getting an out of memory error when compiling with Ajc 1.1 RC1.I know this is not very descriptive, but maybe you can point me into adirection of getting more output.here some additional information though:Code base is medium size (about 1500 classfiles)I removed all my aspects and still receive the error.Running it from the command line: ajc classpath whateveritis sourcerootswhateveritis d whateveritis
